card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

card.name: Approach of the Second Sun

card.text: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

card.name: Trespasser's Curse
card.text: Enchant player Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under enchanted player's control, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Trial of Ambition
card.text: When Trial of Ambition enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices a creature. When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Ambition to its owner's hand.

card.name: Trial of Knowledge
card.text: When Trial of Knowledge enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard a card. When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Knowledge to its owner's hand.

card.name: Trial of Solidarity
card.text: When Trial of Solidarity enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Solidarity to its owner's hand.

card.name: Trial of Strength
card.text: When Trial of Strength enters the battlefield, create a 4/2 green Beast creature token. When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Strength to its owner's hand.

card.name: Unburden
card.text: Target player discards two cards. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Unconventional Tactics
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Whenever a Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {W}. If you do, return Unconventional Tactics from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Unesh, Criosphinx Sovereign
card.text: Flying Sphinx spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Whenever Unesh, Criosphinx Sovereign or another Sphinx enters the battlefield under your control, reveal the top four cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Unquenchable Thirst
card.text: Enchant creature When Unquenchable Thirst enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Vile Manifestation
card.text: Vile Manifestation gets +1/+0 for each card with cycling in your graveyard. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Vizier of Deferment
card.text: Flash When Vizier of Deferment enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature if it attacked or blocked this turn. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Vizier of Many Faces
card.text: You may have Vizier of Many Faces enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except if Vizier of Many Faces was embalmed, the token has no mana cost, it's white, and it's a Zombie in addition to its other types. Embalm {3}{U}{U}

card.name: Vizier of Remedies
card.text: If one or more -1/-1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many -1/-1 counters minus one are put on it instead.

card.name: Vizier of Tumbling Sands
card.text: {T}: Untap another target permanent. Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Vizier of Tumbling Sands, untap target permanent.

card.name: Vizier of the Anointed
card.text: When Vizier of the Anointed enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with eternalize or embalm, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle your library. Whenever you activate an eternalize or embalm ability, draw a card.

card.name: Vizier of the Menagerie
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast creature spells from the top of your library. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast creature spells.

card.name: Wander in Death
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Wasp of the Bitter End
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, you may sacrifice Wasp of the Bitter End. If you do, destroy target creature.

card.name: Wasteland Scorpion
card.text: Deathtouch Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Watchful Naga
card.text: You may exert Watchful Naga as it attacks. When you do, draw a card. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: Winds of Rebuke
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Each player mills two cards.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
